resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

personId.name: personId
personId.description: ID of the person to add the tag to
personId.ai_hint: ID of the person to add the tag to

eventId.name: eventId
eventId.description: ID of the event to retrieve
eventId.ai_hint: ID of the event to retrieve

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

attendanceId.name: attendanceId
attendanceId.description: ID of the attendance to retrieve
attendanceId.ai_hint: ID of the attendance to retrieve

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

title.name: title
title.description: Title of the petition to create
title.ai_hint: Title of the petition to create

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: comments
options.description: Comments to leave when signing this petition

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

email_addresses.name: email_addresses

values.name: primary
values.description: Whether this is the person's primary email address

values.name: status
values.description: Subscription status of this email address

email_addresses.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: comments
options.description: Comments to leave when signing this petition

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

petitionId.name: petitionId
petitionId.description: ID of the petition whose signature to update
petitionId.ai_hint: ID of the petition whose signature to update

signatureId.name: signatureId
signatureId.description: ID of the signature to update
signatureId.ai_hint: ID of the signature to update

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the tag to create
name.ai_hint: Name of the tag to create

tagId.name: tagId
tagId.description: ID of the tag whose tagging to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tagId.ai_hint: ID of the tag whose tagging to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

taggingId.name: taggingId
taggingId.description: ID of the tagging to remove. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
taggingId.ai_hint: ID of the tagging to remove. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'attendance' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'attendance' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'personId'
